date.headline: Brute Force Attempt #1
date.text: Attacker tries to Brute-force portal.sarif.com, using an dictionary of email addresses for valid sarif employees.

date.headline: Notification to OPSEC
date.text: Adam Jensen notified OPSEC of possible intrusion attempts.  OPSEC immediately logged in to verify.

date.headline: OPSEC notification to Sarif Industries
date.text: OPSEC notified System Owners, Application Owners, and Affected Users

date.headline: Brute for signature was identified
date.text: Adam Jensen gives the full list of accounts being attacked on the portal and legacy portal

date.headline: Portal Admin Accounts disabled
date.text: OPSEC and QA worked together to disable all portal admin accounts

date.headline: SOC adds Responder Policies
date.text: OPSEC instructed SOC to add responder policies, mitigating the first Brute-Force attempt.

date.headline: Nikto Scan Against legacyportal.sarif.com
date.text: Attacker attempted a niktos scan against legacy portal

date.headline: Brute-Force Attempt #2
date.text: Second Brute-force attempt was noticed against legacy portal.

date.headline: Instructed SOC to blacklists Attacking IPs
date.text: SOC took list of attacking IPs and blacklisted some of them as a result of a 2nd Brute-force attempt to legacy portal.

date.headline: Attack End
date.text: We stopped seeying malicious data at this time, offical attack end time.

date.headline: OPSEC Compiles list of sources
date.text: OPSEC parsed all attack data to show that all sources originated from a company called LIMB International, Inc.  -  A hosting provider.

date.headline: OPSEC Notifies LIMB International
date.text: OPSEC sent an email to LIMB International, notifying them of possible breach of their servers.

date.headline: Legacy Portal accounts disabled
date.text: OPSEC and QA worked together to disable all legacy portal admin accounts
